Item ID6605

The White sword is a White Knight weapon that requires level 10 Attack and completion of the quest Wanted! to be equipped. This weapon can be purchased in Falador from Sir Vyvin if your White Knight rank is at least Peon.

As with all White equipment, it offers the same bonuses as Black equipment but with a prayer bonus, and cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

The '''White sword''' is a [[White equipment|White Knight]] [[weapon]] that requires level 10 [[Attack]] and completion of the [[quest]] [[Wanted!]] to be equipped. This weapon can be purchased in [[Falador]] from [[Sir Vyvin]] if your [[White Knight rank]] is at least Peon.

As with all [[White equipment]], it offers the same bonuses as [[Black equipment]] but with a [[prayer bonus]], and cannot be made using the [[Smithing]] skill.
